THIS IS ROCKNEVENTS

ABOUT US

CORPORATE | SOCIAL | TECH & VIRTUAL EVENTS

ROCKNEVENTS is an experiential event planning firm that specializes in crafting the most momentous, luxury, out-of-the-box events. We offer a Full-Service journey, where clients can experience ease and luxury. Let our talented team and detailed collection items bring all celebrations to life.

ROCKNEVENTS’ story begins in Los Angeles, CA. With no event planning experience, Jenny Chang founded ROCKNEVENTS with one vision - her leading a team of event producers and designers in vibration of this world, one celebration at a time.

Since launching ROCKNEVENTS in 2013, we have opened branches in Los Angeles, CA; San Francisco, Las Vegas, NV; Miami, Florida. Now, ROCKNEVENTS is a worldwide traveling company. Wherever your experiences are, ROCKNEVENTS will be there. ROCKNEVENTS aims to break the boundaries of the Experiential Events sphere and revolutionize the industry through an all-inclusive and diverse service.

WHAT OUR PARTNERS HAVE TO SAY ABOUT US

“Thanks to ROCKNEVENTS I had a FLAWLESS and more perfect event than I could even imagine. RNE far exceeded my expectations. They were a perfect combo of fairy godmothers and NINJAS on the night of, right down to the detail of making sure I ate some food. They made use of EVERY tiny piece of decor I had purchased over the months. It. Was. Perfect.”

— BREE M.
